meanings.definition: The simultaneous production of electricity and useful heat from the same energy source.
meanings.sent1: Cogeneration helps save energy by producing both electricity and heat at the same time.
meanings.sent2: The factory uses cogeneration to efficiently generate electricity and heat.
meanings.sent3: Cogeneration is like having a two-in-one energy machine!
meanings.sent4: In a world of separate energy production, cogeneration shines as a dual-power superhero.
meanings.sent5: Cogeneration is a smart way to get more out of a single energy source.

meanings.definition: The process of generating electricity and heat together in a single, integrated system.
meanings.sent1: Cogeneration systems are designed to produce electricity and heat in a combined manner.
meanings.sent2: The hospital installed a cogeneration system to meet its energy needs efficiently.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a machine that can cook your food and charge your phone - that's cogeneration!
meanings.sent4: Cogeneration is like a power couple, always working together to provide energy.
meanings.sent5: The cogeneration process is like a dance between electricity and heat, perfectly synchronized.

meanings.definition: The combined production of electricity and heat from a single fuel source.
meanings.sent1: Cogeneration allows us to get electricity and heat from just one type of fuel.
meanings.sent2: The apartment building benefits from cogeneration, using a single fuel source for energy.
meanings.sent3: Using cogeneration is like making a delicious meal with only one ingredient!
meanings.sent4: Cogeneration is a magician turning one fuel source into two valuable forms of energy.
meanings.sent5: With cogeneration, a single fuel source becomes a powerhouse of electricity and heat.
